text: Stephanie Michelle Seymour (born July 23, 1968) is an American model and actress. During the 1980s and 1990s, she was one of the most popular supermodels. In 2000, Seymour played Helen Frankenthaler in the movie Pollock. In 2002, she played Sara Lindstrom in an episode of Law & Order: Criminal Intent. ==References== Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from San Diego Category:Models from San Diego
title: Stephanie Seymour
